row: Each row represents a pericyte marker used to reproduce the bar chart showing expression in normoxic vs hypoxic iPSC-derived pericytes.

columns.name: SYMBOLS
columns.description: the gene symbol of the pericyte marker

columns.name: Group
columns.description: whether the cells were normoxic or hypoxic

columns.name: Expression_mean
columns.description: the normalized mean expression value of the gene under the given condition

columns.name: Expression_sd
columns.description: the standard deviation of the normalized expression value

notes: The figure was digitized manually; numerical values were extracted directly from the plot to reproduce Figure 2D.
Only the four canonical pericyte markers shown in the figure (ANPEP, CALD1, CSPG4, PDGFRB) are included.
Expression values reflect normalized gene expression reported in the figure, not raw data from sequencing.
